article.title: Electroweak production of Higgs boson pairs in 2HDMs

multiple_choice_question.text: Based on Figure 1, in a Type-I 2HDM scenario where m<sub>h</sub> + m<sub>A</sub> < m<sub>Z</sub>, what is the approximate maximum cross section for electroweak production of hA pairs at the LHC with √s = 13 TeV?
According to Table 1, which benchmark point (BP) exhibits the largest difference between the cross sections for electroweak (qq → hA) and gluon-initiated (gg → hA) production of hA pairs?
choices: The difference is approximately the same for all three BPs.

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 2 (left) compares the cross sections for QCD and electroweak production of hA pairs. What does the color map in this figure represent?
choices: The mass of the h boson (m<sub>h</sub>)
The mass of the A boson (m<sub>A</sub>)
The combined mass of the h and A bosons (m<sub>h</sub> + m<sub>A</sub>)
The difference in mass between the h and A bosons (m<sub>h</sub> - m<sub>A</sub>)

multiple_choice_question.text: Based on the information presented in the article, what is the dominant decay channel for a light charged Higgs boson (H<sup>±</sup>) in the Type-I 2HDM scenario considered?
